title: National Digital Library Project
text:
Department of Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD), Government of India (GoI) under its National Mission on Education through Information and Communication Technology (NMEICT), has entrusted Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur to host, coordinate and set-up National Digital Library (NDL) towards building a national asset. It is a project of National Importance.
https://ndl.iitkgp.ac.in/
